mapper.select: select otherAccountNo, name as otherAccountName from (select otherAccountNo, name from (select A.otherAccountNo, C.name, A.dealDate from kangbank_deal_detail A, kangbank_account B, kangbank_customer C where C.email = B.email AND B.accountNo = A.accountNo AND A.accountNo=#{value} and a.dealType='withdraw' ORDER by A.dealDate desc) GROUP by otherAccountNo, name) where rownum<=10
